website_summaries.verdict: A solid option for cold-weather pajamas that offers warmth and coziness, but tends to have some issues with shrinkage.
pros: Customers love that these are made of a soft, cozy flannel that is lightweight yet warm
Many felt they were good quality for the cost, and that they are well made and sturdy
cons: Since these are made of 100 percent cotton, shrinking after washing was a common concern
A few also had issues with the seams not holding up over time

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves them! This is my first experience with PajamaMania. I gave these snowflake PJs to my wife as a Christmas Eve gift. For years I gave her PJs from Victoria Secrets - but the quality of their product has declined, while the price has increased over the past few years, so I decided to try PajamaMania. I am VERY pleased and will be returning to them again in the near future (Valentine's Day is coming!)
customer_reviews.author: Rick C.

customer_reviews.title: Quality PJ’s
customer_reviews.text: I got a pair of these size medium last christmas 2016 and I have worn and washed them a lot. Some shrinkage but very little and not enough that it matters to me. I ordered myself this pair for christmas 2017 same size because I love this brand and I could count on size fitting me and I like to get Pajamas at christmas. i wear size 6-8 pants, med tops so size Medium in these PJ’s is spot on. This year I ordered my sister some of these and I know she will be as happy as I am. The quality of these is excellent. The flannel is really a nice quality too. Highly Recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: JJenkins

customer_reviews.title: The fabric is really pretty and colors are as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Medium, which is the size I normally use, and it was little big for me. The sleeve doesn't start at the shoulder and it seems to big. The fabric is really pretty and colors are as pictured. It is a little warmer that I expected, good for winter. Would have liked the fabric to be softer.
customer_reviews.author: Mariamore87

customer_reviews.title: I ORDERED A LARGE BUT I KNOW THAT A MEDIUM WOULD HAVE BEEN A BETTER FIT. I KNOW FOR A FACT THAT PJ'S ...
customer_reviews.text: THE PJ'S ARE A LITTLE TOO BIG FOR ME. I ORDERED A LARGE BUT I KNOW THAT A MEDIUM WOULD HAVE BEEN A BETTER FIT. I KNOW FOR A FACT THAT PJ'S DO SHRINK WHEN WASHED. I DO LIKE THE MATERIAL AND I KNOW THAT THESE PJ'S WILL LAST A LONG TIME. I WILL BE ORDERING ANOTHER PAIR BUT THIS TIME I WILL ORDER A MEDIUM. THE PJ'S ARRIVED ON TIME. THANK YOU !
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Just got these pajamas and after 2 washes, they ripped so easily. Wish the quality was better since the design is so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: All that I hoped for...a nice flannel that will stand the test of time, neatly trimmed with coordinated satin, quality stitching, and soft warm comfort for chilly nights...all for a price that doesn't break the bank. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: 12Junes

customer_reviews.title: Pretty print of cardinals on light blue
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality flannel pajama set. The flannel is soft and comfortable, warm without being too thick. I am 5'3", 120 lbs., and purchased the Medium instead of Small because I guessed that it might shrink since it is 100% cotton. Before washing, the length of the pants legs dragged the floor. After machine wash and tumble dry, they shrank a little in length and now are perfect. The sleeves still come down to my wrists. Something to consider, if you want easy care wash and dry, select the size accordingly to allow for shrinkage.
customer_reviews.author: hypnoshop

customer_reviews.title: Bizarre Fit
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted these to fit since they are adorable but the fit was just bizarre. The top was a bit to snug around the waist, but the pants were too large around the waist. The same area, and one piece is too small and one is too large. It almost felt like the two pieces were different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Soft, quality flannel pajamas in a gorgeous pattern--9/10, definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: The fit is roomy like a pajama should be. I bought my usual size and it fits as expected. Appears to be very well made—no hanging threads, no weird seams, no places where it scratches or fits oddly. The flannel itself is in a great, modern design so I don't have to feel old-fashioned in my favorite, toasty fabric. And the price is just right. If I have one tiny quibble, it's that I like a pocket on the pajama top—preferably two—and this brand does not put pockets on the chest. But these jammies are so beautiful and comfy I'm not just overlooking that, I'm practically forgetting that's usually a deal-killer for me. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas are made with an excellent quality flannel and are well-sewn. I was hoping to order several more pairs but I’m disappointed in the low waistline. I’m 5’ 2” and bought a medium. The fit is roomy and perfect lengthwise but when I sit or squat the pants pull down in the back. As I said I am short and still have this problem. So sad. I love cute pajamas and really wanted to buy several more pair.
customer_reviews.author: SoMiKo

customer_reviews.title: They were much larger than expected, so I had ...
customer_reviews.text: They were much larger than expected, so I had to return them. I normally wear a medium/large, depending on the length. I'm not really that tall either, just leggy. I'm 5'6", 140 lb. The large was barely long enough, but it was too wide. The waist on the pants was too big and they were falling off of me. If I had gone with a medium, they probably would have been too short. Just weren't the right fit for me I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa D

customer_reviews.title: Too bad because I was about to order a second pair
customer_reviews.text: These were so cute and seemed well made at first. I washed them in cold water on gentle, hung dry, and the piping is all coming off. Basically it’s shredding. Too bad because I was about to order a second pair. Glad I didn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Buss

customer_reviews.title: did shrink a touch but factored this into purchase size so all good. gets softer with every wash
customer_reviews.text: after first wash, did shrink a touch but factored this into purchase size so all good. gets softer with every wash. lovely jammies
customer_reviews.author: JCope

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and comfy pj's
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely say these run a little small. I wear a size 7 in jeans and got the large. They are a little baggy which I like. Haven't washed them yet but don't plan on drying them in the dryer. I always have a problem with the bottoms being long enough. I am 5'9" and the length on these is perfect. They are really nice quality and the colors are great. Even cuter than they look in the picture. I plan on getting another pair. Would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise L  Miller

customer_reviews.title: Could be a winner
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my 96 year old mom. She did not like the length (too long) or the buttons, since she has difficulty with them. That's my fault. The quality is very good and they are super cute fabric and a good weight. I just didn't score big with this purchase, based on the description and her needs.
customer_reviews.author: Asaph Psalter

customer_reviews.title: These are a great addition to my PJ collection
customer_reviews.text: These are a great addition to my PJ collection. The fit was perfect, I normally wear a large and the large was a perfect fit. I have worn these several times and they have survived the washing machine each time with no defects or imperfections. The colors are great and they are very warm. Glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: rparrish

customer_reviews.title: Snuggle up with these soft pajamas
customer_reviews.text: I am super picky about my pjs. I returned three others. I ordered the polar bear print which is as cute as can be. The material is super soft and reminds me pjs of yesteryear. Snuggle up with these. They wash well and are sturdy. My Belgion Malinois loves to pull me out of bed with his teeth and they are holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Katein theCity

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I am 5.5 size 29 jeans, 32D bra size and the medium fit perfectly. If you want an over sized fit go a size larger. The fabric feels nice, pills a bit between the thighs due to friction. The only thing I wish was better is the waist band elastic--it is a bit loose. Drawstrings would help. Probably fine for a more straight figured person with a flat bumb. I machine wash and dried them and they did not shrink. New favorite pajamas. I hope they hold up well, I think they will.
customer_reviews.author: Viola

customer_reviews.title: Pants fit weird
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these. I got a size XS (I am 5'2" 95 lbs). The inseam on the pants was really weird. It came up really high giving me almost a wedgie! Not a good fit. The pants were long, which was expected for me, I could just cuff them. But the weird pants inseam was the deal breaker. They will be going back. The top was a little loose, also expected for my petite frame. I would not benefit from sizing up because the pants would be even longer and the top would be xtra large.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Cozy pjs
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’6” and weigh 130. I received a pair of size large pjs as a gift but found them small in the waist. I returned them easily, no problems AT ALL and got a different pair sized xl. Yes they’re too wide all over but find the waist fits perfect. I’d rather have too big everywhere else than have a waist too tight. They’re not a thick flannel but a nice lighter weight flannel. I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Nursietj

customer_reviews.title: One flaw
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, there is a problem with the pants. Although the quality of the material and stitching is very nice, the rise on the pants is too short. This causes the crotch to ride up and give a wedgie. Too bad, because otherwise, this would be a 5 star set of PJ's. Pattern needs to be adjusted to include more room between the waist and the crotch.
customer_reviews.author: D55

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable pajamas
customer_reviews.text: these are very comfortable and cozy pajamas that fit as expected. they are not too heavy and are a great cotton flannel that are well made. my only negative would be that after one wash they did fade a pretty good bit which for me personally I didn't mind to much, but if I were gifting them I would be bothered by.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Calloway Ready

customer_reviews.title: Soft & Warm Well Made PJs
customer_reviews.text: Love these babies. Wore the heck out of them already and we had a mild winter. Usually cotton pants of any kind shrink in length but not these. I’ve washed and dried them 3x and they are still too long for my 5’4” body. I turn up the hem twice and they are perfect. Only one complaint is NO POCKETS. The pj top also has a L Brest pocket that’s stitched closed. Used to tell if clothes were made well to have stitched closed pockets. I slit mine open but now the pocket does cling to a top of worn under. Should’ve left it closed but it’s all good bc I’m home wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: This is for kids- Shrinks A LOT in the wash.
customer_reviews.text: Nice fluffy cotton flannel fabric, except IT SHRINKS IN THE WASH ABOUT 3 INCHES! Washed it on delicate cycle, no mistake, same delicate setting in the dryer. Size small fits now my kid ( 4’10”, 95 pounds). It looks like Capri and 3’4 sleeve top on an adult after 1st wash.
customer_reviews.author: Olena Z.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this purchase: The red Cardinals on blue is REALLY cute, especially if you like Cardinals/are from the east coast. The birds sit on snowy tree limbs which was not obvious on the product link. I have washed them one time and they held up nicely. I am 5'3", 130 lbs. and the medium fits nicely with enough room, even after washing and drying in the dryer. Will be purchasing more for Christmas gifts/for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn R

customer_reviews.title: Bottom Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the size XS. The top fits great, just enough room to feel comfy. The bottoms are a little long but ok. The waist is awful...it has a seam front, back, and each side. The elastic is bunched up at the seams. Wore for the first time and when I turned over there was a lump on both sides of the waist band at the seams. It is awful and the pants are low rise but the buttox is cut way too small. I am a true xs petite and the bottom is the worst fit ever. I bought earlier this year and just started wearing this fall and cannot return.
customer_reviews.author: UP Mom

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Sleepwear.
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Made the mistake of ordering another brand of sleepwear along with PajamaMania. When they arrived together we would have been embarrassed to give them as a gift compared to PajamaMania. Glad we bought two sets.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy...but we’ll see
customer_reviews.text: So first, the product runs small. Still have to return my original purchase but ordered my replacement prior to returning as my daughter needed pjs. So I’ve washed this set twice and, already, the elastic on one side of the pants is done. Not happy to say the least. Haven’t contacted the seller yet. Will modify my review if they do the right thing.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: cotton polar bear ajamas
customer_reviews.text: Buy a size larger than you normally would because the cotton, even though washed on gentle in cold, shrank about one size. Left a lot of lint in the dryer vent afterwards, but the fabric is soft, medium thickness, and fairly durable. There is satin piping on the edges, which is nicely done. Well made, cute pattern. Added surprise: a single back pocket on the pajama bottom.
customer_reviews.author: marce

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Sleeping Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable cotton flannel--100% cotton. After washing them, I did not notice any significant shrinkage. There is even a small back picket! Considering how expensive cotton pj's can be, I figure these are a bargain at $25.
customer_reviews.author: C. E. Delage

customer_reviews.title: Best flannel pajamas ever!
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas are made beautifully and they fit perfect! I had always bought Joe Boxer large and worn them to a shred and these are softer and I like them even more. I am 5’5” and 135 pounds, size 12 and the large in these pajamas is made for me! Not too short or long and the large pocket in the back is a huge plus. They are nice and warm, the perfect weight. I ordered the navy and they’re very smart looking.
customer_reviews.author: mary mitten

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful print, really bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy when it arrived 3 weeks ago. The print it’s beautiful, just as pictured. The fabric got a little fuzzy, if that makes any sense, but it didn’t make the pj’s look ugly or old. But today... after only waring it 4-5 times, it broke ON ME when I was sitting. I feel not only very sad because I loved it, but tricked and like someone just stole money from me. PS: the pj’s fitted perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Francina Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR THIS WINTER (2015)! Already wearing Them!!!
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas are so pretty and comfortable. I sleep all through the night when I wear them on a cold night. VERY NICE. They're not baggy like a potato sack nor bulky, but they are roomy and comfortable and look nice on. The blue is prettier in person. I recommend shaking, then washing before wearing them because of the shedding. Make sure you wipe out your washer before you put a load in after them because they shed a little. These are very nice quality flannel.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: P J' S that are so soft and delightfully comfortabel.!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These PayamaMania are a delight. They fit well they are so soft and they match my comforter and sheets. Now I also found a throw and slippers . It makes a remarkable bedroom. I really love the pajamas . Am thinking about ordering another pair. Thanks for carrying these on your site.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: I love these pajamas
customer_reviews.text: For so long I’ve been cold in bed at night as my husband likes to sleep with the ceiling fan and AC on. These pajamas made me warm and cosy. They are so soft and just the right amount of room to feel very comfy. I am a size 4-6 and ordered a small so they would be comfy. They fit great. The elastic in the waistband doesn’t cut into me and the crotch doesn’t ride up. I’m 5’6 and they are the perfect length. I’m going to buy other colors! I’d highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: It's NOT made in China!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these pj's! Very well made, nice soft flannel. I'm 5'3" 130 lbs fits perfectly. Best thing about it and reason why it's well made IT'S NOT MADE IN CHINA! It's made in Cambodia. I bought the black and white striped with flowers, it was the cheapest one but the prettiest, the flowers have shades of burgundy and pink, very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Sunglow

customer_reviews.title: Material fell apart in my hands
customer_reviews.text: I washed these once and the material started to rip down the inseam on one leg. I thought it may have just been tangled up in the washer, so I planned to sew it up, but then I realized the fabric was just falling apart as if it had been shredded by bear claws. From the crotch to the ankles, the fabric is simply weak and shredding more as I touch it. Do not buy. cheap cheap!
customer_reviews.author: eview99

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these pajamas for my daughter, along with the "cupcake" pattern. Quality is excellent. The nice brushed flannel will definitely provide warmth, and the white ribbing on the pajama tops add a special "wow." By always washing in cold water, and drying on a low heat setting, you'll have clothing that will give you years of use. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe all the reviews!
customer_reviews.text: I received the pajamas a couple of days ago. The fabric is soooo soft. They look and feel good on. But I ordered a small and they were a bit snug around the shoulders, leaving no room for the expected shrinkage that can accompany cotton. I ordered a small because several reviews said the pajamas were much bigger than expected and to buy a size smaller. I was so happy with these pajamas that I reordered a medium the same day. I'm 5'4", 125 lbs. I appreciate that amazon.com has free returns!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl B

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Cute, Fit Well (As Advertised), Decent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a little bitty 93-year-old who loves them. She's only 5 feet tall, so I had to take the legs up about 4 inches, but the arms were perfect. I've washed and notice the edges of the red penguins slightly lost their definition, but there was no bleeding onto other areas. I washed cold and machine dried. Nice piping! Will definitely buy again if we need another pair, even for others!
customer_reviews.author: S. Roth

customer_reviews.title: Very cozy
customer_reviews.text: IIf you like to sleep cozy these are the pjs for you
customer_reviews.author: Karen wayman

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Cozy
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened the package I thought wow, they’re gigantic! But then I remembered reading the reviews that they shrink, which they do! The top is a little short and boxy for my liking. The distance between the waist and crotch seems a little short, I pull them down to my hips so I don’t get a smirf!! If you catch my drift! 😳. The colors are vibrant. And the material is soft after washing. I’m 5’6” 165, and a L fit nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Bottoms are too small for stated size
customer_reviews.text: Bottoms were not the size expected and were very uncomfortable to wear. Have bought pjs from other companies without this problem. Have noticed company and they have responded indicating others had cited this problem and they will be revising their sizing in future production. I did check the sizing chart before ordering. I will donate these to charity as I am to uncomfortable when wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Myra Ungrady

customer_reviews.title: Gray poka dot
customer_reviews.text: these are nice, quality flannel pajamas. i wear a size 4, but like my pjs big so i ordered a medium. am glad i did because the set i received is none too big. in fact, i would prefer to have the elastic around the waist looser and the length from waist to crotch inches longer. if they shrink, the pants will be uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: kathty jw

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but Shrink easily !
customer_reviews.text: The design on this pajama set is very cute but upon the first wash ( following the instructions to wash in cold water and dry on light heat ) they shrunk ! The colors stayed stayed bright but they're a bit too short in the legs and sleeves. For reference I am 5ft 6" 130 lbs and I ordered a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Optimal coziness!
customer_reviews.text: So comfy and cozy! After years of suffering in the winter, I finally decided to get something warm to sleep in. This set is perfect! It’s slightly oversized, but that just means optimal snugness. It’s very warm, but not so hot that you wake up sweating. Embrace the overly cutesy matching polka dot pajama set!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material!
customer_reviews.text: I liked these at first, but after several washings — on gentle cycle — the cotton began to feel coarse. You get what you pay for! I’m a solid medium, and these are definitely smallish although wearable. Don’t recommend if you like thick, cozy flannel.
customer_reviews.author: Linney

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money, soft & comfy
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my grandma for christmas. O was specifically looking for a thick cotton flannel pajama and these seemed to match the description. They wash well by but you an see some pilling. I also wish they had a drawstring waist rather than just elastic. My grandma is tall but very thin so she would have benefitted from a drawstring waist. She loves how warm they are.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Khosh

customer_reviews.title: DON'T PUT THEM IN THE DRYER!
customer_reviews.text: The flannel fabric is warm, cozy, and substantial, but READ THE WASHING INSTRUCTION carefully. They have to be air dried! I put them in the dryer on moderate heart after the first washing, and the bottoms shrank in length to the point where the crotch is uncomfortably short. The top fits fine, even after drying, though.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbi Diane Elliot

customer_reviews.title: Way too short
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a medium and it's big in terms of width however it's way too short in length-the top (can see my belly button), the sleeves (should say 3/4 sleeves!) , and pant length (higher than highwaters). I'm 5'8 145lbs. So very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Not a Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: I returned these because they don't fit well, the top seemed small (I ordered a small and I am 5'1" and 98 pounds with a 34A). The sleeves were on the short side. However the material seemed nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable light flannel pyjamas
customer_reviews.text: I chose these pyjamas due to the colour and snowflake design as well as the fact they are a fairly light flannel and not too warm. They are soft to wear and a comfortable loose fit. They are holding up pretty well to wear and washing although there is a significant amount of pilling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ill fitted
customer_reviews.text: Do not like the fit of these. They felt misshapen, to small in areas and large in others. I'm 5'2" and 119 lbs and they are too short in arms and legs and I ordered the S.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Was not as happy as I wanted to be
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted more from these pajamas. I was so excited to get them and have warm PJ's for the winter. They do keep me warm but the first month they smelled weird no matter how many times I washed them. Finally they stopped smelling but random shirt buttons come apart when I sleep. The collar always looks bad unless I iron it and lets be real, I'm not ironing my pj's to go to bed. The bottoms are great though.
customer_reviews.author: Alli & Topher Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Fine right out of the package
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little concerned with the "wash in cold water because it may shrink" directions. If it does shrink, it may be too small, because the fit is exact right now (I got XL, which is my size. The legs are too long, but I'm 5"2" so the legs are always too long. That's why I prefer a little shrinkage). In my experience, good-quality 100% cotton doesn't shrink in warm water. It might in the dryer, so I'll air dry it for now. Otherwise, very pretty and comfortable. The flannel is not very thick, but it's not flimsy either, so I'm pretty satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Grundfest

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy With These Pajamas
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas are cute, soft and comfortable. I ordered the red pajamas with the star pattern. I was completely satisfied until I washed them. The red fabric bleeds terribly in the laundry. I wish I could return them because I am not happy with my purchase. However, I doubt I can return them since I have thrown away the tag and washed them.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette G. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: They should carry it in petite sizes not just misses and Plus Sizes
customer_reviews.text: The material is warm and cozy-- bright red is what i got with stars on it. I am only 5'1" ( used to be 5'4 but that was before my discs got compressed some years ago, from a fall, and of course, osteoporisis.. I had to hem the pants and took them up about 2.5 inches in length. So i urge the company who makes these nice PJ's to offer in petite sizes, too
customer_reviews.author: TeriJaye

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, felt-like quality, terrible return policy
customer_reviews.text: Terrible cheap quality. Honestly it feels like felt for a children’s craft project, stiff, scratchy and uncomfortable and definitely smaller than expected. I wanted to return but I was told I’d have to pay for the cost of shipping which would have cost the same as the actual pajamas. So I am stuck with pajamas I will never wear. Maybe I can cut them up and use for dusting. That’s pretty much the only thing I could see this material being used for.
customer_reviews.author: natasha galvez

customer_reviews.title: Shrinks
customer_reviews.text: I'm wear a medium and it fit well right out of the package but shrunk ALOT. It is now snug and the sleeves and legs are too short. Other than that, it is cute and soft with the piping being a nice accent.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: A bit overpriced
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas are cute, pretty well made, but are overpriced. Maybe $19 but not the current asking price.
customer_reviews.author: Sea

customer_reviews.title: Snuggly soft
customer_reviews.text: My mom wears size 16/18 pants, so I ordered XL (because of the reviews) shes about 180 or 190 and shes 5 3' They fit perfect. But the length is to long, she just rolls em up. She loves them. Haven't washed em yet, so read the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Sherlyn

customer_reviews.title: sizing correct
customer_reviews.text: Love them! I bought xtra large because I like jammies roomy. I didn't find that they shrunk after washing them. I could have gotten away with size Large and they still would have been roomy. Very comfortable, warm but not too warm.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pajamas!
customer_reviews.text: These are great pajamas - soft & perfect fit for 5'3", 130 lbs woman. They still remain soft even after washing/drying. And I love the fact that the top is a little bigger which means it won't rip easily for a tosser/turner. They are thin but perfect for Arizona. And at a great price! Buy these, you will not be sorry! Also love the gray plaid!
customer_reviews.author: Nina M BourBeau

customer_reviews.title: Not soft inside
customer_reviews.text: They fit well though. However I washed them and put them on before bed and had to change because they are prickly-itchy! They are soft on the outside where the print is and not as soft on the inside toward the skin. SMH
customer_reviews.author: Muse

customer_reviews.title: These are well made
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is very soft and they are super cute. I am 5'6" and 130 lbs and the medium is a little smaller on me than I would like. Consider ordering a size up. I haven't washed them yet, but I definitely wont put them in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: annie s.

customer_reviews.title: Love these PJ's!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pajamas. They are soft & cuddly. I picked the red - my favorite color. I haven't washed them yet so I can't speak to that. They are true to size! I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I pictured.
customer_reviews.text: These are so soft and cute. Arrived with a terrible chemical smell but it washed right out. The only reason I say 4 instead of 5 stars is the shoulders are cute just a little too straight and not rounded so there is a slight tightness there. They fit true to size and are nice and fluffy.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT PJ choice!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, thick material and quality. I’m 5’7” and the medium is perfect. I’m so impressed because the legs and arms are a smidge long but the body area is fitted but not baggy. The price is just right too. I’m buying more in every colour.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Size runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: Like the fabric and color. Runs a little small in my opinion. I weigh 105 lbs and these are just right (could be just a tad looser for comfort.) So if you are anything but a very small person, don't get size small. Otherwise, I am pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute cute cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my daughter who loves anything cardinals. They were a big hit and she wears them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Carol W, Fort Wayne, IN

customer_reviews.title: They ripped! : (
customer_reviews.text: Light flannel. Would order a size up. Wore to sleep approximately SIX times an a large rip developed in the pant buttocks area. Disappointed as liked the pattern and style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine for the money
customer_reviews.text: Cute. But color is stamped on the front so the white from the reverse side shows. Also placket isn’t stitched down making it curl up when washed and difficult to button. They are comfortable. Buy big.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Nattaglia- Triggs

customer_reviews.title: warm & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I buy these flannel PJ's for my mom and also myself. My mom is elderly and she loves them because they are warm & she can button the buttons without a problem. Other PJ's have smaller buttons which she has trouble with. We both like the quality & value & fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for dog lovers and pajama lovers!
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable pajamas for dog lovers like me. The fit was perfect, the flannel is soft and shows no signs of pilling, even after washing. I highly recommend them to dog lovers and pajama lovers!
customer_reviews.author: KimsMom

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was captivated by the images of your pajamas and their description. The soft flannelly cloth and amazing colorful prints. But I was really disappointed when my pajamas arrived without the free woman inside.
customer_reviews.author: John Magee

customer_reviews.title: Soft, warm, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these jammies. They are soft and warm. The quality is very good. They are comparable to a few sets I bought elsewhere for a much higher price. I purposely bought them a little larger than my usual size but these are huge, but that's okay. I would buy these again
customer_reviews.author: deezee

customer_reviews.title: Runs small and HOT
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little small. Would size up if you are in between sizes. Also note these are SUPER WARM. If you are naturally cold you will love these! I like them for wearing around before bed but definitely can't sleep in them.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Watson

customer_reviews.title: Too small, awkward fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these due to high reviews. I ordered a size smaller than usual as most reviews claimed they ran big. Brand new before the first wash, they fit nice and fabric was great. After one was, the fabric looked old and the sleeves shrank a lot. The waistline was awkward and low. I tried to wear them to bed again, but they were too uncomfortable to sleep in. I would not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Denney

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: These jammies are perfect and just what I was looking for. They are very well made and very warm for those cold winters coming up. I have already ordered another pair. What a great price.too.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Nice soft cotton pj’s
customer_reviews.text: These pj’s are very soft for being 100% cotton, and fit really well. I am 5’2”, 160 lbs, and ordered Large. Nothing beats Angelina for cozy polyester flannel pajamas, but if you need cotton, you will be happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J. Rief

customer_reviews.title: I wish size xs was a  tiny bigger
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’7 100 lb and usually getting 0-2 (xs). I wish pant were longer. Top fits good. However wish it was tiny bigger. Size 4-6 did not even an option for me. Would be too big. I know for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: It's itchy.
customer_reviews.text: It is not what I would consider "flannel" - - - and it's itchy even even after a wash with fabric softener. I would definitely not recommend this product to any person on this planet.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Franks

customer_reviews.title: Soft warm and fluffy
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with these period they are super soft and warm. One trip through the washer and dryer and they came out fluffy and perfect. I ordered another flannel nightgown from a different company and paid twice as much and it was hideous. This is super nice for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Coburn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Soft, fits nicely, washed up perfectly, a pocket on the butt and a pocket on the chest,. The way these pajamas were priced I was expecting maybe some below par qualities. I WAS COMPLETELY SATISFIED. My new inexpensive jammies are great. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Itsjustme

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cozy
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that even after a wash the pants are still long enough. That NEVER happens with pajama pants for me. The fabric is very comfortable without being too hot. I'll order more!
customer_reviews.author: Hermommy_Granger

customer_reviews.title: cute and 100% cotton!
customer_reviews.text: i have petroleum/polyester allergies and not bothered by this pajama! cute and 100% cotton! this kind of quality for 100% cotton pajamas is hard to find, so i'm happy to have found this! will purchase a few more
customer_reviews.author: Jean A. Guth

customer_reviews.title: Cozy
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected and they didn't hardly shrink. Don't wrinkle hardly at all, either. Cozy, medium weight fabric. Good for the 30 degree nights we have here in the winter. I'm glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Sherilyn

customer_reviews.title: Love the print & material!
customer_reviews.text: Love the print & the material! I usually get a small but it was a little too snug. I returned & got a medium which fit perfect! It's very soft & easy to wash. Will be purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: lezah

customer_reviews.title: These pj's are fairly well made. Almost too hot ...
customer_reviews.text: These pj's are fairly well made. Almost too hot. I got the XL because I wanted them to shrink up and still have a lot of room and didn't shrink too much. Cozy against the skin.
customer_reviews.author: J. Green

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great PJs. Loved them so much, I went back and bought 2 more pairs. I normally wear a small (I'm a size 4, 118 pounds and 5'5") but I like my PJs to be a bit big. I bought a medium and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: BlueDog476

customer_reviews.title: Soft Flannel PJs
customer_reviews.text: These are really soft and the elastic waist is a plus. I would rather have side seam pockets instead of a patch pocket on the back and the color/pattern choices were not my favorite but for comfort these get the win over others I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Boxy Fit
customer_reviews.text: The top is super wide and the pants fit weird. It’s almost like the top is an old extra large petite. That said... I love the back pocket! And these work good enough. But the top is kind of short, so my midriff sometimes gets cold. I’m 5’ 2” and 115 lbs and a B cup.
customer_reviews.author: Spit Fire Pixie

customer_reviews.title: Love these, I now have a collection!
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of these pj’s in different patterns and I love them all. The flannel is thick amd cozy and they come out of the dryer with no wrinkles. I have washed a couple of pair at least 40 times and both still look and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Munz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty PJs
customer_reviews.text: These PJs are beautiful and so comfy. The cardinals are brilliant red and really stand out against the blue background. They washed up well and I didn’t see much shrinkage after drying them. I recommend them to anyone that loves to wear pretty cozy PJs.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my wife and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Search no more...
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Search no more.. I got a size large and I’m a size 10/12. They fit nice and cozy .. perfect size for lounging around. Soft material too. I would def buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Really soft flannel
customer_reviews.text: Really comfy, soft flannel pajamas that fit well after washing. I usually wear a 2X, but ordered a 3X since I knew they'd shrink a lot and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mugsy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pj's
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size small and they fit perfectly!! Soft and comfy even after washing. I liked them so much I bought another pair. Not too hot when sleeping as is the case with most pj's, being a native Floridian I recommend these from north to south!!
customer_reviews.author: Debi Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Size up for comfort
customer_reviews.text: I received a pair of these pajamas for Christmas in the size I typically wear. They were a bit tight in the top and that did not make for comfortable sleeping. I ordered a size up and they are comfy and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Dale

customer_reviews.title: SOFT AND COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: Material is soft and remains so after washing. Minimal shrinkage after washing once and none after later washings. Ordered 3 more pairs afterward.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Beltran

product_meta.title: PajamaMania Women’s Cotton Flannel Long Sleeve Pajamas PJ Set
feature_bullets: Classic straight-fit mid-weight cotton flannel sleepwear with soft, brushed feel
Top: Full button-down closure, rounded notched collar, 1 chest pocket, satin piping detail and cuffed sleeves
Pant: Relaxed fit, 1? wide elastic waistband and back patch pocket
Care Instructions: Wash before wearing. Wash and dry inside out. Machine wash cold with like colors. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low
